explains: v. 使……去掉，使……去除；摆脱，消除
wordGroup: get rid of 摆脱，除去
get rid 摆脱；排除；处理掉
got rid of v. 免除，除去，摆脱
get rid off 摆脱，去掉

sentences.en: She wanted to be rid of her parents and their authority.
sentences.cn: 她想摆脱父母及其权威的束缚。

sentences.en: I can't get rid of this headache.
We got rid of all the old furniture.
sentences.cn: 我们扔掉了所有的旧家具。
